short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the word 'cookie' with 'biscuit' on British .uk websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bri'ish people be like, "We use biscuits to improve your experience on this site." 

Made as a joke, this extension replaces all occurrences of 'cookie' on .uk domains with 'biscuit' or any other word of the user's choosing.
